secret_rule: Only items that are commonly found in a supermarket can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Apples" and "bread".
I'd like to make a new guess. Can I bring "carrots" to the game?
I'd like to make a new guess. Can I bring "donuts" to the game?
I'd like to make a new guess. Can I bring "eggs" to the game?
Player: I'd like to make a new guess. Can I bring "fish" to the game?
Player: I'd like to make a new guess. Can I bring "grapes" to the game?
I'd like to make a new guess. Can I bring "honey" to the game?

Based on the examples and the confirmations from the game master, the pattern appears to be that you can bring items to the game as long as they are one-word food items that start with a lowercase letter. My best guess is that the rule is: "You can bring any one-word food item that starts with a lowercase letter."
